Articles.Content:
Hi all,

Bought the game a few weeks ago and am really enjoying a unique space experience. I grew up in the days of Apollo, watched Armstrong step onto the Moon on our black and white TV and have been fascinated with space flight ever since. Did a degree in Aeronautics and Astronautics, but never worked in Astro... so this is helping fill that hole.

No real achievements so far, other than accidentally launching 3 Kerbals into orbit round the sun when I was just 'tweaking' their orbit.... feel a bit bad about that, but guess it gives me an excuse for trying to design a rescue mission one day....

Thanks to all who've put so much time into this....

Gazzernaut
Welcome newcomer! I hope you enjoy this as much as I do! Have fun on the forums!

Welcome to the community Gazzernaut

Wow, to have grown up at that time and seen the moon landings, I can't imagine how amazing that must have been, KSP lets us imagine our own flights and missions to the Mun but surely it can't compare.

We'd be interested in hearing your thoughts of those times, and we'll help you with your orbits if we can
Glad to see a new Kerbonaut enjoying the game. Welcome to the KSP Community! Now, CAREFULLY design those rockets, and head for the MÃƒÂ¼n! Happy Kerbaling!
